levels.description:
When this skill is equipped: Device gives an ally Operator ATK <@ba.vup>+12%</>
When activated, immediately gain a device. Attacks deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Physical damage, and device effects increase by <@ba.vup>{fake_scale}</>x
<@ba.rem>All active devices are destroyed when skill expires</>
